titleStmt.title: A commentarie or exposition vppon the twoo Epistles generall of Sainct Peter, and that of Sainct Jude. First faithfullie gathered out of the lectures and preachinges of that worthie instrumente in Goddes Churche, Doctour Martine Luther. And now out of Latine, for the singuler benefite and comfort of the godlie, familiarlie translated into Englishe by Thomas Newton
Enarrationes in epistolas Divi Petri duas et Iudae unam. English
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.
